en.login: Welcome back {name}! Your accesslevel is '{accesslevel}'. Last login: {lastlogin}
en.first_login: Welcome {name}! Your accesslevel is '{accesslevel}'. This is your first time logging in!
en.authorising_user_subtext: Does this take longer than 5 seconds? Try reloading the page.

nl.login: Welkom terug {name}! Je toegangsniveau is '{accesslevel}'. Laatste login: {lastlogin}
nl.first_login: Welkom {name}! Je toegangsniveau is '{accesslevel}'. Dit is de eerste keer dat je inlogt!
nl.authorising_user_subtext: Duurt dit langer dan 5 seconden? Herlaad dan de pagina.
